description.plain:
Tauheed Epps better known by his stage name 2 Chainz (born September 12, 1977) is an American rapper who born and raised in College Park, Georgia. He is known for his witty lyrics and unique delivery.

He originally went by the stage name Tity Boi but decided to change his name to signify his growth as an artist.

2 Chainz was originally a member of the duo Playaz Circle (under the name Tity Boi) and an artist under Ludacris' DTP label. Since leaving DTP in 2010, he has signed to Def Jam Records and frequently collaborates with Kanye West’s G.O.O.D. Music label, even though he is not officially a member.

His discography consists of five studio albums and ten mixtapes.

songs.full_title: No Lie by 2 Chainz (Ft. Drake)
songs.title: No Lie

description.plain:
“No Lie” is a song by Atlanta rapper 2 Chainz, released as the lead single from his debut studio album Based on a T.R.U. Story which came out in 2012.  The song  features Canadian rapper Drake and was produced by Mike Will Made It. The single has sold over 1,400,000 copies digitally and has been certified gold.

The music video was directed by Director X:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uQZMaG1eO74

songs.full_title: I'm Different by 2 Chainz
songs.title: I’m Different

description.plain:
“I’m Different” is the third single released from 2 Chainz' debut studio album. It was preceded by “No Lie” and “Birthday Song.”

On the braggadocious track, Chainz talks about what makes him stand out from the rest of the rappers in the game.

songs.full_title: Good Drank by 2 Chainz (Ft. Gucci Mane & Quavo)
songs.title: Good Drank

description.plain: 2 Chainz, Gucci Mane, and Quavo form a potent triumvirate of Atlanta trappers on “Good Drank,” a new release produced by Mike Dean. On “Good Drank” Mike Dean creates a more pensive soundscape, one better suited for Tity Boi and La Flare’s extravagant raps. Quavo continues to solidify his reputation as one of rap’s great hooksmiths.

description.plain:
“Watch Out” is the first offering from 2 Chainz' 2015 mixtape Trapavelli Tre,, which is the third installment in his Trapavelli mixtape series.

The song, which was produced by FKi, later also ended up on Tity Bois and Lil Waynes album, “Collegrove”. Even though it’s a collaboration project, Wayne has no verse on the songs album version.

songs.full_title: It's a Vibe by 2 Chainz (Ft. Jhené Aiko, Trey Songz & Ty Dolla $ign)
songs.title: It’s a Vibe
songs.title_with_featured: It's a Vibe (Ft. Jhené Aiko, Trey Songz & Ty Dolla $ign)

description.plain:
“It’s a Vibe” was the third single released in the lead-up to 2 Chainz’s Pretty Girls Like Trap Music. This smooth, laid back track features three of the biggest names in R&B; Ty Dolla $ign, Trey Songz and Jhené Aiko. Chainz first shared this Murda Beatz produced track in March alongside the song “Smartphone”. It’s a Vibe and Smartphone were both released to hold over the fans after Pretty Girls Like Trap Music was delayed from dropping on its original April 7th date.

The music video for “It’s a Vibe” was released on April 20th. It has appearances from the three features on the song, as well as a short scene showing the producer of the track, Murda.

description.plain:
“Big Amount” is a classic rap braggadocio on which 2 Chainz and Drake showcase their wealth and punchline prowess. During Drake’s verse he admits that rap is just a hobby, and his focus is on Billboard hits. The two have collaborated often, but this track was apparently held up by Apple, with Tity Instagramming a conversation he had with Drake via DM:

description.plain:
2 Chainz flips a sample from The Weeknd’s August 2011 track, “The Birds Pt. 1” on “Like Me,” a warning shot to all his potential suitors. The two team up to boast about their heartbreaker personalities and uniqueness.

The Weeknd doesn’t add any new vocals on this track and is rather just labeled as a feature for the sampled chorus.

songs.full_title: Bigger Than You by 2 Chainz (Ft. Drake & Quavo)
songs.title: Bigger Than You

description.plain:
On June 14, 2018, 2 Chainz took to Twitter to announce the release of “Bigger Than You,” which features both Drake and Quavo.

https://twitter.com/2chainz/status/1007295847476932608

It’s currently unconfirmed whether or not the song is a promotional single for 2 Chainz' upcoming album Rap or Go To the League.

Interestingly, Quavo’s contribution to the song comes from his unreleased remix to Travis Scott’s “Butterfly Effect”.

description.plain: This track is stylized as a battle in both form and in the video. Wayne and 2 Chainz told Rob Markman it was merely friendly competition, and their intention was to focus on dropping bars. They go back and force in short sharp bursts, spitting venom at each other in the name of hip-hop.

songs.title: Realize

description.plain:
“Realize” is a track off of Pretty Girls Like Trap Music, the fourth studio album by 2 Chainz. He raps about partying and drugs.

The song also features Nicki Minaj, and in her rap verse, she disses her rival, Remy Ma, and Nicki shows pride in her success. Nicki also responded to Remy Ma’s diss track, ShETHER, with No Frauds, which she teamed up with Lil Wayne and Drake, and Swish Swish by Katy Perry which features Nicki.

songs.full_title: PROUD by 2 Chainz (Ft. Offset & YG)
songs.title: PROUD

description.plain:
“PROUD” is a song of 2 Chainz, YG, and Offsett talking about how their mom influenced them and how they came up.

Ever since achieving fame and fortune each artist has done exceptional efforts to assist their mothers



2 Chainz recently purchased a new home for his mother. He went to Instagram saying:

. “I Bought her a house 2012 before I knew I was gone be one of the biggest artists out here …,, still!!! I love you, mom, you deserve it!”


On Christmas of 2017, Offset also acquired his mother an $800K house, taking to social media, quoting:

“F R O M H U N C H O A N D T A K E O F F M E R R Y C H R I S T M A S M A M A H U N C H O Love You Enjoy Your New Home,”.




On YG’s Album My Krazy Life, she was commended for the “Momma Speech Intro.” Her thoughts on the song:

“[It was] the night he had to turn in his album, I surprised him and came to the studio,” Mama YG recalled of her recording session.
“At first he was kind of like upset that I was there, and then he was like, ‘Well, I guess since you’re here, you might as well do the intro to my album.’ So once YG wrote down what he wanted me to say, I went into the sound booth and I killed it,” she continued, laughing.

songs.full_title: Momma I Hit a Lick by 2 Chainz (Ft. Kendrick Lamar)
songs.title: Momma I Hit a Lick
songs.title_with_featured: Momma I Hit a Lick (Ft. Kendrick Lamar)

description.plain:
“Momma I Hit a Lick” is the first direct collaboration between 2 Chainz and Kendrick Lamar. The Pharell-produced track sees the two boasting their success and shouting out famous African Americans such as Mannie Fresh, Fab Five, and Vivica.

A “lick” is a quick—usually illegal—way of obtaining money, commonly through hustling or robbery.

album.full_title: #MEALTIME by 2 Chainz
album.name: #MEALTIME

songs.lyrics:
Garlic Mashed Potatoes

• 2-3 pounds yukon gold potatoes (half peeled, half unpeeled)
• 1/4 stick unsalted butter
• 1/2 pint heavy cream
• 3 tablespoons minced garlic
• 3 tablespoons sour cream
• Handful of chopped parsley
• Kosher salt, black pepper, garlic powder

1. If wearing a four-finger ring, carefully place it on a side table before starting to cook
2. Cut potatoes into quarters add butter with the mixture
3. Place potatoes in a pot of salted, cold water, and bring to a boil
4. Let potatoes boil vigorously until they are fork-tender
5. While potatoes are boiling, pour heavy cream, minced garlic, salt and pepper into small gold sauce pot, add butter with the mixture, and bring mixture to a boil
6. Strain potatoes through golden colander, and place in a separate golden bowl
7. Once this is done, play "Feds Watching" and celebrate the good times you had this year
8. Once done with that, add sour cream and half of the chopped parsley to the potatoes
9. Slowly add the heated cream mixture to the potatoes while whisking, creating a creamy, smooth consistency
10. Adjust flavor with salt, pepper, and/or garlic powder
11. Serve in gold bowl and garnish with remaining parsley

songs.full_title: MF'N Right by 2 Chainz
songs.title: MF’N Right

description.plain:
The second track off Chainz’s mixtape Felt Like Cappin, it was received so well it featured on the collaborative project with Lil Wayne: COLLEGROVE, and spawned a remix with a Lil Wayne verse on it.

The track see’s Chainz link back up with Mike WiLL Made It, and the intro adlibs see Chainz commending Mike on the beat’s “hard"ness. The two are most famous for their collaboration on “Someone To Love.”

The song has become part of his live show, being performed at Rolling Loud Festival and his TIDAL concert with Lil Wayne.

The song was used on FX’s Atlanta episode “Money Bag Shawty”

description.plain: “Dedication” is a nod to Weezy’s acclaimed mixtape series of the same name, and it’s 2 Chainz' ode to his mentor, collaborator, and friend. Wayne was so touched by the gesture he “teared up” upon hearing the track.

songs.full_title: Smell Like Money by 2 Chainz (Ft. Lil Wayne)
songs.title: Smell Like Money

description.plain:
“Smell Like Money” starts with Wayne spitting a fiery a cappella verse. It isn’t until the 14 lines in that Da Honourable C.N.O.T.E.’s heavy, cinematic beat drops.

Because Wayne’s first begins with “Here I go on that C5” some speculate that this is either a reject from his upcoming Carter V album, or even a preview.

Chainz then comes in on the second part of the song with his own slow verse and matches Wayne’s classic punchline rap.

description.plain:
“Turn Up” is the fourth song from 2 Chainz' mixtape T.R.U. REALigion.

On the appropriately upbeat track, 2 Chainz flaunts his lifestyle- from his cars to his jewelry to his women.

songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
2-hour long conversations on the phone, can't get you outta my mind
Baby are you feeling me, feeling you...
Everything you say and everything you do gets me lost in you days at a time
Tell me are you feeling me, feeling you... 2 Chaaaiinzz

[Verse 1]
Breaking up with my ex was the hard part
Had to pull the ass out like the gar-bage
Bout to take this new thang to a pinnacle
You feel me, feeling you I ma-ssage your physical
Thank God... I'm spiritual
She ask me what I'm finna do I say get into you
One leg up followed by the other
Get a little head then I find a rubber
We don't talk on the phone - we Tiger text
That mean she send a few flicks and I send a check
You 'memba Shonda, the one that had a Honda
Good head on her, you can learn a lot from her

[Chorus]
2-hour long conversations on the phone, can't get you outta my mind
Baby are you feeling me, feeling you...
Everything you say and everything you do gets me lost in you days at a time
Tell me are you feeling me, feeling you... 2 Chaaaiinzz

[Verse 2]
In the a.m. I think about her fragrance
When she met me I made her change all her statements
Not what she say... but what she bank
And how she think... I can't complain
On to the next one pro-gression
Keep the past and the present, separate
I got alotta spots like a leopard
One to trap in, one to have sex in
One to stack in, one to get dressed in
I'm getting married Ben Franklin my best man
3 cell phones she got all the numbers
I told her right then it was all or nothing
Yeah I'm on that loud I know you heard of me
Hair-weave killer, emergency
Hair-weave killer, I murder weaves
Hair-weave killer, murder scene

[Chorus]
2-hour long conversations on the phone, can't get you outta my mind
Baby are you feeling me, feeling you...
Everything you say and everything you do gets me lost in you days at a time
Tell me are you feeling me, feeling you... 2 Chaaaiinzz
